nodes.text: The EPT-212 was a security device manufactured by Fabritech. The device scanned for frequencies specific to droid wireless systems and droid power cell oscillations.
Chalmun installed a refurbished EPT-212 in his Mos Eisley Cantina to discourage droids from entering the premises. At some point it was stolen by Dathcha, but soon returned by a local spacer.
